page.title: 10VILLAGE STORES
page.content: In the 1930's it had it's own phone exchange.It is now owned by Keith & Valarie Davis. They have 2 daughters called Natalie & Kelly.When Keith was clearing the garage out he found a old bakers oven.Now the post office sells items such as sweets,crisps,cigarets, cigars,ice_creams,frozen foods & toys etc..It's the only post office_shop in Fulstow village.The shop is busy throughout the week but on a Saturday it is even busier.On a Sunday the shop is not open.People think that Fulstow shop is far better than Covenham post office_shop because it's far cheaper & it sells much more.
